title: Software Engineering Intern
description:
I had the privilege of returning to Apple Maps as a summer 2025 intern!

 I merged the latest open-source updates to our internal kepler.gl fork, and refactored kepler.gl into a plugin for an internal data visualization platform.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description:
I got to intern with Apple Maps during the summer of 2024!

I worked on the integration of MapKit JS and Apple-themed visualization palettes into Kepler.gl.

I worked on refactoring Kepler.gl using the adapter design pattern to improve the scalability and maintainability of the app.

title: Coding Instructor
description:
I taught students, aged 6-12, the basics of programming in Python, JavaScript, and Scratch.

I also developed and delivered the lesson plans, and provided guidance to students on their assignments and projects.
